item.title: Record of some of my talks
item.description:
Talks and videos 2017

The last few weeks have been really busy and I have given quite a few talks, here are some of the ones that were recorded.

2017

Simons 2nd Workshop on Microbiome, Broad Slides

Birs, February, Video: A historical perspective on treespace.

Birs, Slides: A personal history of searching for treespace.

WidS Video: Statistical Challenges in the Analysis of Biological Data

WidS: How many ways? (to analyse a microbiome data set.)

Joint Mathematics Meetings, 2017: Statistical Proof? The problem of irreproducibility

MAA- special invited lecture, 2017: Statistical challenges in analysing the human microbiome
